title: Roasted pork knuckle with aubergine purée and whole roasted cauliflower
description: Take Sunday lunch to the next level with this moreish dish of rich roast pork, spicy cauliflower and a smoky aubergine purée.
ingredients: 4 brined pork knuckles, trimmed, soaked in water for at least 6 hours
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 whole cauliflower, leaves removed and a hole cut in the core
